DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this clinical study is to evaluate the performance of the COL thermometer by comparing its measurement to equilibrium measurement and to make a final tuning of the thermometer algorithm.
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Evaluation of the Care On Line Thermometer
DOC.criteria: Children (118 years old) in the pediatric or emergency department, with or without fever. An informed consent was signed by the patient's guardian. The medical staff decides that participating will damage patient recovery.
